name: A Sword&Shield Story
description:
Controlls:

As the Dungeon Crawler:

AD - Moving

Space - Jumping

Left Mouse - Attacking

As the Sword & Shield :

AD - Moving

Space - Jumping

Left Mouse - Attacking

Right Mouse - Shield Throw

After Shield Throw:

Left Mouse - Teleport Shield to your Position

Right Mouse - Teleport yourself to Shield

The Shield can be used as a Platform!

I don't know why it's that zoomed in... It wasn't supposed to be like that... Well we've got no time anyway.

Also, I am a new gamedev and this is not finished , didn't have much time, but I thought I should still upload it, because... why not? :D

Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBPLzWlDEApQQnPLYl8qr6g?view_as=subscriber

A "Devlog" about this Project will come out this week. Well, more like a bullying video about this Project.
